Los Angelos, CA

Build With Code - West Coast

Build with Code is a community of coders organized by Codesmith. We host free weekly HTML & CSS, JavaScript, software engineering and career-oriented workshops through immersive lectures and pair-programming sessions. Welcome! Join our community to learn beginner to advanced JavaScript concepts live-streamed online! Most of our events posted will be taking place in the Pacific Time Zone!
